snippet: Watching Adrian Peterson hop ... and hop ... and hop ... and hop his way through the Minnesota Vikings' new stadium, one couldn't help but wonder: How badly might one of the NFL's premier running backs be injured? And: Isn't there a better way to ...
lead_paragraph: Watching Adrian Peterson hop ... and hop ... and hop ... and hop his way through the Minnesota Vikings' new stadium, one couldn't help but wonder: How badly might one of the NFL's premier running backs be injured? And: Isn't there a better way to get a hurt player to the locker room?

headline.main: ICYMI in NFL's Week 2: Peterson 1 of a Bunch of Injured RBs
headline.print_headline: ICYMI in NFL's Week 2: Peterson 1 of a Bunch of Injured RBs
